text.section:
To apply for a license, an applicant shall:
Submit to a criminal history records check in accordance with § 8-303 of this title;
Submit to the Board:
An application on the form that the Board requires;
Written, verified evidence that the requirement of item (1) of this subsection is being met; and
Evidence of compliance with the requirements of § 8-6B-08 of this subtitle; and
Pay to the Board a fee set by the Board.
The Board shall issue the appropriate license to an applicant who meets the requirements of this subtitle.
